name: rpefcld

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cfv(ce, c0), crp), wcel(c0, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ce, c0), crp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(ce, c0), crp))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ce, c0), crp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cfv(ce, c0), crp))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ce, c0), crp))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

comment: The exponential of a real number is a positive real. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
